Let\\'s configure a few things to get yo: Let's configure a few things to get you started quickly.
Give your new Order Bump a name. This is: Give your new Order Bump a name. This is just for admins - it won't be displayed to customers.
Which product should be added to the car: Which product should be added to the cart when this Order Bump is accepted?
The amount or percentage applied as a di: The amount or percentage applied as a discount to the Offer Product. Leave blank or enter 0 to charge full price.
Continue to review your order bump, opti: Continue to review your order bump, optionally add display conditions, and publish.
You must select an offer product.
Auto Add Order Bump to Cart: Auto Add Order Bump to Cart
If conditions are satisfied, automatical: If conditions are satisfied, automatically add this order bump to the cart. Useful for free gifts or other offers that don’t require customer action.
Auto Match Variations Between Search and: Auto Match Variations Between Search and Offer Product
Add offer product to the cart with the s: Add offer product to the cart with the same variable configuration as the product below.
Only applies when Auto Match Cart Produc: Only applies when Auto Match Cart Product and Offer Product are variable products with matching variation attributes (Size, Colour, etc)
Leave unchecked to have customers to sel: Leave unchecked to have customers select variation options in a modal window.
If offer product is not variable, this o: If offer product is not variable, this option is ignored.
The product in the cart to match the Ord: The product in the cart to match the Order Bump variations to.
Match Quantity of Offer Product to Displ: Match Quantity of Offer Product to Display Condition Product
If customer has two of the display condi: If customer has two of the display condition product in the cart, two of the offer product will be added to the cart.
The product in the cart to match the Ord: The product in the cart to match the Order Bump quantity to.
Quantity of Offer Product To Add: Quantity of Offer Product To Add
The quantity to add to the cart when off: The quantity to add to the cart when offer is accepted.
Allow Customer To Change Quantity In Car: Allow Customer To Change Quantity In Cart
Allow customer to change the quantity of: Allow customer to change the quantity of this order bump in the cart.
Default if blank: Your order is almost c: Default if blank: Your order is almost complete...
Default if blank: Add this offer to your: Default if blank: Add this offer to your order and save!
Example: Yes! Please add this offer to m: Example: Yes! Please add this offer to my order
Example: Limited time offer! Get an EXCL: Example: Limited time offer! Get an EXCLUSIVE discount right now! Click the checkbox above to add this product to your order now.
Displays in modal version of Order Bump,: Displays in modal version of Order Bump, such as when configured as an After Checkout Submit Modal or when the Offer Product is a variable product (as opposed to a specific variation).
Default if blank: No thanks, just comple: Default if blank: No thanks, just complete my order
Amount Off: Remove fixed amount from the: Amount Off: Remove fixed amount from the product price. Percent Off: Discount product by specified percentage.
What happens when the display for produc: What happens when the display for product is removed from the cart. Default: Order Bump remains in the cart but bump specific discounts are removed.
Leave In Cart With Normal Price: Leave In Cart With Normal Price
You must set an upsell replacement produ: You must set an upsell replacement product.
Replace a cart item with offer product w: Replace a cart item with offer product when this Order Bump is taken.

This product must be in the cart for thi: This product must be in the cart for this order bump to be shown.
Block Editor is only used for Full Scree: Block Editor is only used for Full Screen Order Bumps (Configurable for After Checkout Submit Bumps). Blocks are ignored for other configurations.
Where to display order bumps. Below Cart: Where to display order bumps. Below Cart Items bumps will always display above the terms and conditions on mobile.
Full Screen Landing Page (Use Block Edit: Full Screen Landing Page (Use Block Editor To Design)
If checked, the bump offer will be displ: If checked, the bump offer will be displayed full screen. Use Order Bump Offer Form block to design the offer.
Show Bump When These Conditions Are True: Show Bump When These Conditions Are True:
This bump will be shown when the correct: This bump will be shown when the correct upsell product is in the cart and the Offer Product is not in the cart. To further limit when this bump is shown, add a rule below.
This bump will always be shown when the: This bump will always be shown when the Offer Product is not in the cart. To limit when this bump is shown, add a rule below.
